original_text: Then the Lord sent a fire to show that he accepted the gifts. It completely burnt all the fat and the offerings that were on the altar. The people were very happy when they saw this. They shouted and they fell down with their faces to the ground.
korean_text: 불이 여호와 앞에서 나와 제단 위의 번제물과 기름을 사른지라 온 백성이 이를 보고 소리 지르며 엎드렸더라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord sent a fire
to show that he accepted the gifts
It completely burnt all the fat
and the offerings that were on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제단 위에 있던 모든 제물을

sentences.original_text: and they fell down with their faces to the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드렸다
